Desc.eng: Ah, what a breath of fresh air it is to see you, Van Helsing. We had to kill our wounded to prevent them turning into these fiends. Where are the reinforcements?
We are the reinforcements. As always.
Then this quarter surely is doomed. I grew up here, you know.
Good, then find your way to the fish market. The Inkgate is there. Go!
We are forever in your debt. Give them hell. Goodbye!
